Content: Pops should have binary political issues like militarism vs.
Then each pop has a position on the issue expressing its proximity
to one of the two poles.
With this method politics become an array of integers which should
be less complicated than other models.
It could be necessary to attach weights to each issue,
this can implicitly done bye assuming issues close a 50/50 split
An alternative is to assign a split in one issue fanatics but I
believe that approach is ill suited for realistic models
